thread.title: ACS audiovisual solutions scoops National Business Success Award 2015
thread.title_full: ACS audiovisual solutions scoops National Business Success Award 2015

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: ACS audiovisual solutions scoops National Business Success Award 2015
text:
ACS audiovisual solutions scoops National Business Success Award 2015 ACS audiovisual solutions scoops National Business Success Award 2015 Details Category: Awards   11:00 ACS audiovisual solutions has announced that it has been selected INDUSTRY WINNER in the AV category of the National Business Success Awards 2015! The National Business Success Award 2015 is the largest business award in the Netherlands. The mission of the award is to bring the success of leading companies in various industries to the attention of the general public. 
A summary of the jury decision: 'ACS audiovisual solutions presents itself as the defining specialist in its field. The key to being succesful is the synergy with a daughter company providing IT solutions, enabling custom made solutions tailored specifically to the need of the client. Innovation is the keyword at ACS, continuously improving on products and services, broadening their range on offer and investing in the most recent equipment and technology.' Related articles
